name: Red Bumblebee
description:
The Sea of Japan has been overtaken by Kaijus!
It’s up to Captain Kurosawa, the fearless pilot of the Red Bumblebee, to protect Japan from the incoming threat of monsters before they cause mayhem.
(´・ω・｀)
---------------------------------------------------------------------
Controls:
W, A, S, D to move
Left Click to shoot
Right Click to dash
Esc to pause
Alt+Enter to fullscreen
